title: Is a distance education degree from Madras University valid? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi For checking validity of any university do check UGC grant for the university and DEB list for the same. You can check the latest list before making your decision to Join University. Top 3 distance education institutes are ICFAISYMBOSISIGNOUHappy learning !!!!
As per Madurai HC verdict, distance education degrees are not eligible for teaching posts. It is valid for other jobs in Government, and other sectors.
